name: A Mars Moose Adventure: Cosmic Quest 1 - City Sights
description:
A Mars Moose Adventure: Cosmic Quest 1 - City Sights is among the more than 100 Lightspan Adventure educational games that were distributed to American elementary schools in the mid-to-late 1990s.

Mars Moose must lure his dog Cosmo down from a tree in the park by earning 14 dog treats around the city. To do so, he must travel to various locations -- a pet store, a pizzeria, and a recycling center -- and help the shopkeepers organize their merchandise.

Part of Lightspan's reading and language arts curriculum, the game is geared toward children ages 5-7 and aims to teach vocabulary, prepositions, and sentence structure.
